title: TPACK-Based Technology Integration Competency Development for Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Program focusing on technology integration skills in social science education contexts, targeting professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can explain technology-pedagogy-content integration strategies for science lesson design based on the TPACK model with 80%+ accuracy.
Learners develop and present three or more blended learning design cases utilizing LMS, collaboration tools, and educational software.
Learners practice a process for measuring learning outcomes and providing feedback using digital assessment tools with 90%+ participation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
